info.name: Xentral API Copy
info.description:
Xentral is an ERP platform.

Contact Support:

item.name: Invoice

request.description: Returns a collection with all invoices.

response.name: Requested resource representation does not exist.

item.description: An invoice is a commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer relating to a sale transaction and indicating the products, quantities, and agreed-upon prices for products or services the seller had provided the buyer.

    "isActive": false,
    "locale": "est voluptate",
    "isAdmin": true,
    "email": "et Duis quis aliqua",
    "isFirstLogin": true

}

item.name: [EPHEMERAL TOKEN REQUEST] Copy
item.description:
It is advised to create a Personal Access Token and use that for making calls with a token that is persistent.

The endpoint in this collection allows the user to create a token with limited lifetime. This token expires the moment you request a new one.
